Title: Pre-flight Safety Check
Description: Complete visual inspection of drone and verify all systems operational

Title: Battery Inspection
Description: Check battery levels and ensure full charge before flight

Title: Weather Assessment
Description: Review weather conditions and confirm safe flying parameters

Title: Flight Path Planning
Description: Map out inspection route and identify key areas of interest

Title: Equipment Calibration
Description: Calibrate camera and sensors for optimal data capture

Title: Data Upload Verification
Description: Confirm all captured data is properly uploaded to cloud storage

Title: Post-flight Report
Description: Complete detailed flight report with findings and recommendations
